summary: Medieval surcoat coat of plates featuring heraldry from various nations.
descriptionHtml:
Medieval surcoat coat of plates featuring heraldry from various nations.

Currently features Plantagenet (English), Edward III (English), French, Scottish, Spanish, and German surcoats.  For each, there is a light version with no shoulder-pads and a heavy version with shoulder-pads.  There are no female meshes, I do not know how to make meshes yet, so if someone wants to make it for me, that would be great.

The armor can be found by typing "help surcoat" in the console and adding it via "player.additem xxxxx x"  Alternatively you can find it in the test cell "coc qasmoke" then it is in a barrel.

I plan on adding more designs in the future and am open to suggestions.

V1.2 Features: Stormcloak, Imperial, and Dawnstar designs, more to come in the future.

V1.1 Features: male meshes for females, and 4 new designs; Wessex, Saxon, Holy Iron Chain Knights, and Irish.  Also I removed the PSD files, so the file should be a lot smaller now.


Used Credos' Cleric Armor meshes, specifically the crusader armor.
Also used LordBaraban's Witcher 2 style plate armor for the steel armor textures; I would highly reccomend downloading it as well, as my mod only includes the surcoats.  http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22602/?
author: Lizard2176
